location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

physicalDescription.extent: Dimensions:70 x 96 mmCondition:The image is in good condition.Foliation:'b'; '14'Process:Silver gelatin print

mods.abstract: Genre/Subject Matter:View in Bundar Abbas [Bandar Abbas]. At left a group of men and boys stand alongside a high stone or brick wall, looking towards the camera. In the centre background a further three figures, one holding a paraso,l stand. At right a woman and person carrying a vessel on their head walk away from the camera.Inscriptions:Lower left, below image, in pen: ‘'Bundar Abbas.’Upper left, above image, in pencil, crossed-out: ‘b’Lower right, alongside image, in pencil: ‘14’Lower right, below image, in pen: ‘(May. 1917)’
